content: scrappy birthday cowl by kristen johnson a cozy neck warmer in two versions cowl and infinity scarf that combines marling and fun to knit bobbles for a colorful stash busting project marling is simply holding 2 or more strands of different colored yarn together as you knit creating a fun randomly speckled effect this is great for using up scraps from previous projects especially if you make a lot of socks or fingering weight shawls think of your scrap stash as an artist s palette and have fun experimenting with blending yarns yarn abbreviations three strands fingering weight yarn held together bobble bind off approximately 750-800yds/685-730m for cowl co cast on version and 1100-1200yds/1005-1100m for k -
